activities: Dollar Financial subsidiaries and affiliates in the EU collect personal information from customers, potential customers and employees and may process some of this information in the United States to complete risk decisions, complete customer analytics, develop global employee plans, manage the whistleblower hotline program, etc.
eucountries: Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: All complainants are encouraged to refer privacy issues to Dollar Financial Group at Privacy.Officer@dfg.com for resolution. If the issue cannot be resolved to that individual's satisfaction, Dollar Financial Group will agree to mediate the issue using the European Union Data Protection Authorities (DPAs).
